posts.title: War and Peace: Elegance in Dress
Closer to Modernity: The Nineteenth Century
A Revolutionary Moment
posts.text: Social history figures into fashion trends. The eighteenth century, which included the influential years of the Enlightenment, brought clothing changes of various natures. It was the French Revolution, however, that turned men in trousers against men in breeches and exposed the yawning gap between classes.
